H0.text: Fruits and vegetables are the best source of vitamins and minerals.

H1.text: Bread, rice, and pasta are the best source of vitamins and minerals.

H2.text: Milk and milk products are the best source of vitamins and minerals.

H3.text: Meat, fish, and poultry are the best sources of vitamins and minerals.

A4.text: Muscle tissue is high in protein, containing all of the essential amino acids, and in most cases is a good source of zinc, vitamin B12, selenium, phosphorus, niacin, vitamin B6, choline, riboflavin and iron.
